method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_rscale_is_supported
method.comment: Check whether rscale is supported.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_rscale_supported_calendars

returns.comment: Array of calendars. Currently always NULL.

method.comment: Get an array of calendars supporting rscale (currently always return NULL).

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_new
i_cal_recurrence_type_clear
method.comment: Reset an #ICalRecurrenceType.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_day_day_of_week

parameter.name: day
parameter.comment: The encoded day which represents the day of the week and Nth day of the week.

returns.comment: The decoded weekday with Monday to be 1.

method.comment: Decode a day to a weekday in a week.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_day_position

parameter.name: day
parameter.comment: The encoded day which represents the day of the week and Nth day of the week.

returns.comment: The decoded day of the week. 0 == any of day of week. 1 == first, 2 = second, -2 == second to last, etc

method.comment: Decode a day to a position of the weekday.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_encode_day

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position to use. 0 == any of day of week. 1 == first, 2 = second, -2 == second to last, etc

returns.comment: Encoded @weekday and @position into a single value

method.comment: Encodes the @weekday and @position into a single value, which can by split by i_cal_recurrence_type_day_day_of_week() and i_cal_recurrence_type_day_position().

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_month_is_leap

returns.comment: Whether this month is a leap month.

method.comment: Decode a month and check whether it is a leap month.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_month_month

returns.comment: The actual month number regardless of the leap flag.

method.comment: Decode a month from an encoded value by i_cal_recurrence_type_encode_month().

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_encode_month

parameter.name: is_leap
parameter.comment: %TRUE, when the month is leap, %FALSE otherwise.

method.comment: Encodes the @month and the @is_leap flag into a single value, which can be split by i_cal_recurrence_type_month_is_leap() and i_cal_recurrence_type_month_month().

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_from_string
method.comment: Convert a string to a #ICalRecurrenceType.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_as_string_r
method.comment: Convert a #ICalRecurrenceType to a string.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_get_until
method.comment: Get the until from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur), NULL); return i_cal_timetype_new_full (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->until);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_set_until
method.comment: Set the until from #ICalRecurrenceType.

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_get_freq
method.comment: Get the freq from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur), I_CAL_NO_RECURRENCE); return (ICalRecurrenceTypeFrequency) (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->freq);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_set_freq
method.comment: Set the freq from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *) i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->freq = (icalrecurrencetype_frequency) freq;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_get_count
method.comment: Get the count from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur), 0); return ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->count;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_set_count
method.comment: Set the count from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->count = count;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_get_interval
method.comment: Get the interval from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur), 0); return ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->interval;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_set_interval
method.comment: Set the interval from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->interval = interval;

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_get_week_start
method.comment: Get the week_start from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_val_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur), I_CAL_NO_WEEKDAY); return (ICalRecurrenceTypeWeekday) (((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->week_start);

method.name: i_cal_recurrence_type_set_week_start
method.comment: Set the week_start from #ICalRecurrenceType.
method.custom: g_return_if_fail (recur != NULL && I_CAL_IS_RECURRENCE_TYPE (recur)); ((struct icalrecurrencetype *)i_cal_object_get_native ((ICalObject *)recur))->week_start = (icalrecurrencetype_weekday) week_start;
